Commenting on these changes, Eric Schmidt said: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. , 22:16 EST Google announced Thursday that co-founder Larry Page would replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive of the Internet giant in April. Google said Eric Schmidt would remain with the company as executive chairman and focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships. The firm's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will work on strategic projects and new products, Google said in a statement. Quotes delayed, except where indicated otherwise. Delay times are 15 mins

There were teams from the Olympic Conference, Burlington County Scholastic League, Suburban One League, Philadelphia Catholic League, Berks County Interscholastic Bowling League, Skyland Conference and the Lancaster-Lebanon Bowling League. The Snowball Classic prides itself in drawing teams from all over the area, bringing together the best teams that high school bowling has to offer, tournament director David Letterman knox said. Each team bowled four games in the qualifying round before the top four teams in each division moved into the semifinals. The semifinals and finals consisted of a two-game Baker format
